SMART_wrapper¶

Wrapper for SMART

class SMART_wrapper.SMART(n_objects, data_list, prior_list, output_list, unique_id='[0.03279535]')[source]¶
compute_orbit_cmd_mode()[source]¶
compute_orbit_config_mod()[source]¶
get_prior_mode()[source]¶
output_folder()[source]¶
set_input_file(index)[source]¶
set_output_file(index)[source]¶
set_prior_mode(mode)[source]¶
SMART_wrapper.SMART_CONFIG_name = 'smart.inp'¶

This wrapper works best as:

iniitialize smart class with objects, and lists to input data and input prior and output files Then set the config file with set_prior_mode( somthing ) to what the prior data format is then run trough all the inpout files launching a new sub-process for each SMATR run with a new thread using the compute_orbit_cmd_mode
